ISIL remains a growing threat in Aghanistan, but the US role in degrading and destroying ISIL does include ISIL elements/groups outside of Iraq and Syria and, again, ISIL haven't yet committed large scale deaths that would result in a yes answer. of course, the typical spring and summer offensives that characterise the fighting in Afghanistan may alter the siutation. the size and capability of groups remains a significant barrier and will this will likely continue to be the case.
